content.rendered:
We are proud to offer many clubs at our school:

  • Reading Rockets with Ms. Creager
  • Fitness Club  with Coach Prinzo and Mrs. Hollenbeck
  • Drama Club with Ms. Russo & Mr. Pollicino
  • Best Buddies with Mrs. Longo and Mrs. Sperry
  • Student Council with Ms. Russo and Mrs. Endieveri
  • Lego Club with Mr. Lamperetta
  • Spanish Club with Mrs. Creager
  • No place for hate club – Mrs. Cannie
  • Advisory club – Mrs. Hollenbeck and Mr. Pollicino
